events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund or an exchange as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the Refund category based on the customer's request for money back due to receiving the wrong product.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case initiated by the customer regarding the incorrect order.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I'll be happy to assist you with the refund or exchange process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the error and proceed with your refund?
Sure, my order number is 89564231, and I've attached a photo showing the incorrect product I received instead of the red jacket.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund for your order within 3-5 business days or send you the correct jacket if you prefer an exchange.
I would prefer a refund. Thank you for handling this quickly, I appreciate the prompt response.
Your refund has been successfully initiated and you should see the amount credited to your original payment method within 3 to 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been processed and you confirmed satisfaction, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us!
